title: colorado health foundation logo
content:
Doing work for a client and they gave us their logo as a psd, but the text is part of the entire logo. I'm trying to work with it in after effects but can't seem to find what font it is. Please help! It's the logo for The Colorado Health Foundation

Font: 

 ITC Veljovic Book 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120853/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-02-04 at 12.15.00 PM copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120853/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-02-04%20at%2012.15.00%20PM%20copy.jpg) | 68.92 KB |
author: chancemultimedia

comments.content: It looks like **[ITC Veljovic Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120853/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Veljovic%20Book%20-%20Regular&fid=d33635153354f10cc478a4a1370f991e&fsize=48&text=The%20Colorado%20Health%20Foundation&wrap=2)** by Jovica Veljovic [1984] available from ITC, Adobe, Linotype
thanks a bunch, sorry for the duplication, still figuring out this formatting.
